page.title: 19A FARM IN STOKEHAM VILLAGE
page.content: Hello! My name is David Hirst and I go to Rampton Primary School. I live on a farm in the village of Stokeham. It is an arable farm of about one hundred acres.There are four farms in Stokeham altogether.My hobby is farming and I would like to be a farmer when I grow up. My house is 100 years old and it used to be a bakery. You can still see the hole where the flour used to come down from. It is the oldest house in the village. Like the other children from Stokeham, I travel to school by mini-bus. There are six of us altogether.
